body: Hi Abraham, thanks for your clarification! However, using the updated GH file, I still got the same error, and I'm not sure what is causing this ... Appreciate if you can kindly advise! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DMNc-KMuV*n4RJXnYxypKDCVG*SjNpV4tnhA1uJ0uzzFcNhy*2yvRp0CkibvvOqsYfGZtuPY0gT5kViAxWjBlk9Eop5q8mH8/0.PNG)I also tried the viewAnalysis component you suggested, and it seems that the sky view on unobstructed vertical surface is larger than 50% even if I increase the simulation resolution up to 4 (50.98%). Does this mean that this component tents to over-estimate sky view for points on vertical surfaces? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DMNc-KMuV*lsv9vcMLDDAI4V2ioLt48XYPanw1SJBBBvnEUDLGe13kJQ2VQYJW6cIACuTsehQBTQTC1FLYBDAKXX9x86wMpo/1.PNG)
